titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2346) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2346) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-156, by Ms. Slaughter.
Conference report shall be considered as read and shall be debatable for one hour, equally divided and controlled.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 73.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 545.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 545, the Chair put the question on adoption of H.Res. 545 and announced the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Dreier demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on adoption of H.Res. 545 until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 183 (Roll no. 345).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2346) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009.
